verbs.description: As [ARG0: President Trump] [V: pursues] [ARG1: an agreement with Pyongyang to relinquish its nuclear stockpile] , he is asking North Korea to do something unprecedented in the history of arms control — to reveal the secrets of a vast nuclear weapons program it has spent decades hiding .

As President Trump pursues an agreement with Pyongyang to [V: relinquish] [ARG1: its nuclear stockpile] , he is asking North Korea to do something unprecedented in the history of arms control — to reveal the secrets of a vast nuclear weapons program it has spent decades hiding .

As President Trump pursues an agreement with Pyongyang to relinquish its nuclear stockpile , he [V: is] asking North Korea to do something unprecedented in the history of arms control — to reveal the secrets of a vast nuclear weapons program it has spent decades hiding .

As President Trump pursues an agreement with Pyongyang to relinquish its nuclear stockpile , he is asking [ARG0: North Korea] to [V: do] [ARG1: something unprecedented in the history of arms control] — to reveal the secrets of a vast nuclear weapons program it has spent decades hiding .

As President Trump pursues an agreement with Pyongyang to relinquish its nuclear stockpile , he is asking [ARG0: North Korea] to do something unprecedented in the history of arms control — to [V: reveal] [ARG1: the secrets of a vast nuclear weapons program it has spent decades hiding] .

As President Trump pursues an agreement with Pyongyang to relinquish its nuclear stockpile , he is asking North Korea to do something unprecedented in the history of arms control — to reveal the secrets of a vast nuclear weapons program [ARG0: it] has [V: spent] [ARG1: decades] [ARG2: hiding] .
